Philip.name: Philip
Philip.description:
<c=c9f000>PHILIP</c>
Your ship engineering officer. His cards <c=keyword>modify other cards</c> in your hand, provide <c=status>REDRAW</c>, and are often <c=downside>unplayable</c>.

redraw.name: Redraw
redraw.description: Lets you discard a card and draw a new one. Costs 1 redraw per discard.

customParts.name: Custom Parts
customParts.description: Gives you {0} redraw at the start of each turn.

CCardCentered.name: Card Centered
CCardCentered.description: The following effects trigger if this card is at the center of your hand.

CCardNotCentered.name: Card Not Centered
CCardNotCentered.description: The following effects trigger if this card is not at the center of your hand.

ANanobots.name: Nanobots
ANanobots.description: On play, remove all other <c=card>Nanobots</c> from hand. If in hand at the end of turn, add a new <c=card>Nanobots</c> to hand.

description.left: Add the following effects to the card to the left. They do NOT trigger when this card is played.
description.right: Add the following effects to the card to the right. They do NOT trigger when this card is played.

description.left: Modify the card to the left. When a card modified by this is played, discard this card.
description.right: Modify the card to the right. When a card modified by this is played, discard this card.

name.left: Modify All Cards to the Left
name.right: Modify All Cards to the Right

description.left: Add the following effects to all cards to the left. They do NOT trigger when this card is played.
description.right: Add the following effects to all cards to the right. They do NOT trigger when this card is played.

name.left: Modify All Cards to the Left (Flimsy)
name.right: Modify All Cards to the Right (Flimsy)

description.left: Modify all cards to the left. When a card modified by this is played, discard this card.
description.right: Modify all cards to the right. When a card modified by this is played, discard this card.

ANeighborsMod.name: Modify Neighboring Cards
ANeighborsMod.description: Add the following effects to both adjacent cards. They do NOT trigger when this card is played.

ANeighborsMod_Flimsy.name: Modify Neighboring Cards (Flimsy)
ANeighborsMod_Flimsy.description: Modify both adjacent cards. When a card modified by this is played, discard this card.

MAttacksPierce.name: Attacks Pierce
MAttacksPierce.description: Makes all attacks on this card pierce.

MBuffAttack.name: Buff Attack
MBuffAttack.description: Increases the power of attacks on the target card by {0}.

MDeleteActions.name: Remove Actions
MDeleteActions.description: Removes all pre-existing actions on this card.

MDontExhaust.name: Don't Exhaust
MDontExhaust.description: Removes exhaust from this card, if it has it.

MExhaust.name: Make Exhaust
MExhaust.description: Adds exhaust to this card, if it doesn't have it already.

MMakePlayable.name: Make Playable
MMakePlayable.description: Makes this card playable, if it was not already.

MPlayTwice.name: Play Twice
MPlayTwice.description: Makes all pre-existing actions on this card take effect twice.

MRecycle.name: Make Recycle
MRecycle.description: Adds recycle to this card, if it doesn't have it already.

MReduceEnergyCost.name: Reduce Energy Cost
MReduceEnergyCost.description: Reduces the energy cost of this card by 1.

MRetain.name: Make Retain
MRetain.description: Adds retain to this card, if it doesn't have it already.

MSetEnergyCostToZero.name: Set Energy Cost to Zero
MSetEnergyCostToZero.description: Sets the energy cost of this card to 0.

description.temp: Sum the damage of all attack actions on this card. Add temp shield equal to that amount.
description.regular: Sum the damage of all attack actions on this card. Add shield equal to that amount.

MStun.name: Attacks Stun
MStun.description: Makes all attacks on this card stun.

MUnplayable.name: Make Unplayable
MUnplayable.description: Makes this card unplayable, if it wasn't already.
